Text: Does anyone know of an emulator that plays this? Chankast doesn't support this (says so in their forums).

@nucleocide

CDI's are pretty much meant for Sega Dreamcast CONSOLEs and not emulators. and yes.. people still have them :P

Quote from http://forums.emulator-zone.com/archive/index.php/t-4082.html
hagbard
1) Get the Utopia Boot Disc 1.1 and DC bios files (dc_bios.bin & dc_flash,bin), unzip both on the Chankast folder

2) Load the Utopia Boot Disc first on Daemon Tools, start Chankast and emulation, then wait until this screen appears 


3) Swap the UBD with your CDI iso file, and wait some seconds.

OR

Maybe this one can help you out
http://www.dcemu.co.uk/vbulletin/showthread.php?t=25906
